xwikidoc.title: OAT
xwikidoc.content:
= Delivery Description =
{{info}} This OAT refers to $wiki_description, version $version_number.
The testing will start on **$start_date** and will end on **$end_date**. If you know that you won't be able to fill in this document on time, please let us know so we can reschedule the start and end dates. If we get no warning or feedback during this session and after, we will consider this OAT as accepted and the project validated. {{/info}}
The testing will take place on $environnement, available at $URL_du_site ($identifiants_acces_protege).
Find under what has been delivered in this version:
(% style="width:99%" %) |=Features |((( $list_of_features_use_a_list )))
Find under the features that are part of the contract but won't be part of the next prod delivery:
(% style="width:99%" %) |=Features |((( $list_of_features_use_a_list )))
= Acceptance test results =
(% style="width:99%" %) |=(% style="width:25%;" %)Acceptance|(% style="width:25%;" %) [ ] Accepted|(% style="width:25%;" %) [ ] Accepted with Conditions|(% style="width:25%;" %) [ ] Refused |=(% style="width:25%;" %)Invoicing|(% style="width:25%;" %) [ ] Accepted|(% style="width:25%;" %) [ ] Accepted after production release|(% style="width:25%;" %) [ ] Refused
(% style="width:99%" %) |=(% colspan="3" %) Testing results |(% colspan="3" %)//Fill in the table with validated and not valitated features// |=Feature|=(% style="width:15%;text-align:center" %)Valide|=(% style="width:15%;text-align:center" %)Non valide |$feature_title|| |$feature_title|| |$feature_title||
(% style="width:99%" %) |=Comments |//Add below any comment or issue that prevents from installing the project on production// |(% height="250" %)\\
If this document does not really fit your needs, feel free to create your own document and attach it to this document.
= Signature =
(% style="width:99%" %) |=Client|=XWiki |//(firstname, name, date, signature)//|//(firstname, name, date, signature)// |(% height="250" %)|\\
